column1: Uchi////Dining with 9 other strangers was great!  We all had different takes on the food
column2: but we all agree that everything was absolutely fantastic.  7 courses of awesome.  I only wish that dessert was on the regular menu.  I suggest that anyone try this experience:  7 courses not on the regular menu
column3: free drink if you arrive early
column5: a less expensive way to experience this restaurant
